title: Learning Analytics Ethics: Responsible Practices in Data-Driven Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data analysis concepts and familiarity with educational technology tools
context.additional_context: Professionals in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields Focusing on Applying Ethical Frameworks When Processing Educational Data

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more ethical issues in data collected by learning analytics systems
Learners can compare/analyze institutional data protection policies and create compliance checklists
Learners can propose preventive measures and responses to potential personal data breaches in large-scale learner data processing
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
